Name: Rumble Runners
About the game: Welcome to Rumble Runners , the biggest racing event in the entire Cosmos ! Race, Customise, Build your own Paths and play online against others! The path is randomly build as you go! 3! 2! 1! Go! Get ready to Rumble -Run! Build your own paths with different shapes and loads of different colours! You'll test your path before it's saved to make sure it's how you've envisioned it. Also to make sure you can complete it! You can change the look of your Golem with the many different parts available. Find your own style by mixing different sets of parts! The Path will Rumble and fall apart from behind! You have a certain amount of Stardust Travels per race, so don't be too reckless! Pick either Race Run, or Infinite Run Mode! Supported by a peer-to-peer network, you can either host or join parties! The Host of the party sets the rules of each race. You can use your own paths for the Path Generation when hosting a party!
